subject: Re: [junit] Re: Running JUnit Test Cases from Web Browser
msgSnippet: ... Yes, it s open source.  Again, it may not be an exact fit, but it s worth looking at as a starting point.  The documentation will have more information
messageBody:
sramaswa007@... wrote:

> Hi,
>
> Is JUnitServlet an open source. I checked the html pages from that
> site and looks like they are running the tests from web site. Please
> let me know.
>

Yes, it's open source. Again, it may not be an exact fit, but it's worth looking at as a starting point. The documentation
will have more information than I'm able to offer.

Mike
